downloadDescription: This poster highlights the architecture and feature set of Microsoft Exchange Server 2010.
detailsSection:
Aside from showing the high-level architecture, this poster highlights the feature set of Exchange Server 2010. Sections include:
  • Management and Monitoring
  • High Availability
  • Mailbox Server Role
  • Client Access Server Role
  • Unified Messaging Server Role
  • Hub Transport Server Role
  • Edge Transport Server Role
systemRequirementsSection:
• The poster is a .pdf file and you will need Adobe Reader to view it.

  • When printed, this poster measures 36 inches by 24 inches.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.

  2. Do one of the following:


    • To open the document, click Open or Run this program from its current location.

    • To copy the download to your computer, click Save or Save this program to disk.
